channel.title: Best place to buy runescape gold? (cheap and trustworthy)
channel.description:
Best place to buy runescape gold? (cheap and trustworthy)
why do they need my phone #?
i havent played runescape in 2 years why is there only a 3k limit wtf how do people buy money?

item.title: Best place to buy runescape gold? (cheap and trustworthy)
item.dc:creator: @Ii_1337_iI Ii 1337 iI
item.description:
@Ii_1337_iI wrote:

In total, over the year i played runescape addictively i have brought atleast 15-20m (i know thats a lot and i regret it) but pretty much all of the sites are trustworthy, but i recomend rs4cash.com or net i forget, if its still running.

item.title: Best place to buy runescape gold? (cheap and trustworthy)
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:5, topic:222253”]i bought gold a few times in the past. they used my number to ring me up to just get my vocal confirmation that I am whom I claim to be.

How do they even manage to transfer much gold lately?[/quote]
They have people who try and exploit every way in the game to transfer large amounts of gp

30k party room, bh, buying/selling items…

i.e level 100+ needs 45min-1hour per mil as level 60-80 needs 2hour per mil
